Class CommentSuppressor

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MatchSuppressor
    class CommentSuppressor
extends Object
implements MatchSuppressor
    Implementation of a MatchSuppressor that suppresses based on whether in a comment.
